subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Raja Man Singh I in pink city Jaipur?
question_hi: राजा मन सिंह I ने जापानी संस्करण में लिया गया एक ग्रेफ किसे विचारित किया है।
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh I
C_hi: सवाई महाराजा सावाई मान सिंह I के संतरणी
explanation_en: Amber Fort was built by Raja Man Singh I and is located in Jaipur, known as the Pink City of India. It was designed by architect Raja Jai Singh.
explanation_hi: अमरेश ग्रेफ कलाई के बैलेनिया कॉलंड कलाई के बैलेनिया कॉलंड
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal was built by Maharaja Kesar Singh Thakur and is located in Jaipur, known as the Pink City of India. It has five storeys and is famous for its unique architecture.
Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II is located in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Ram Singh II. It is known for its intricate carvings and reflects the rich history of the Jaipur region.
